name: LinkExternalIssue
description:
Link or unlink external issues to an internal issue.

Use this tool to link external issues to an internal issue or unlink them by specifying the operation type. Ideal for managing issue relationships between different systems.

parameters.name: issue_identifier
parameters.description: The unique ID or number of the internal issue to which external issues should be linked or unlinked.

value_schema.description: The ID or number of the issue to link external issues to.

parameters.name: external_issue_details
parameters.description: JSON object containing details of the external issue, including `external_issue_id`, `operation` (link/unlink), and `source` system.

external_issue_id.description: The ID of the external issue in the source system.

operation.description: Operation to perform. Use "link" to link issues (default) or "unlink" to unlink issues.

source.description: The source system of the external issue (e.g., "linear", "asana", "jira", "github").

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the pylon API.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID or number of the issue to link external issues to.
